item.title: Anyway to block names with { in it nad if so how?
item.dc:creator: @coal_truck coal truck
item.description:
@coal_truck wrote:

i dont think there is, but you could just change the pass of that account, so no one can use it (when the account is being used) and restart server so he logs.
